property.name: pipeline-workers
property.description: Sets the number of pipeline workers to run

property.name: pipeline-batch-size
property.description: Size of batches the pipeline is to work in

property.name: pipeline-batch-delay
property.description: DELAY_IN_MS When creating pipeline batches, how long to wait while polling for the next event.

property.name: start-log-file
property.description: Write logstash internal logs to the given file. Without this flag, logstash will emit logs to standard output
